title: Manage Site Visitor Access
description: A client representative is visiting the site. The site superintendent must log their entry and ensure they have the required PPE.

tasks.description: Log the visitor's name, company, and time of entry in the site visitor log.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new entry is created in the visitor log.

tasks.description: Verify the visitor has the required Personal Protective Equipment (PPE): hard hat and safety glasses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the visitor has the correct PPE.
